changeSet.id: Trigger to remove query entity DE form record IDs when entity form association is severed
changeSet.sql: create trigger os_del_entity_record_ids after update on catissue_form_context for each row begin if (new.deleted_on is not null) then if (new.entity_type = 'CollectionProtocolExtension') then delete from os_cp_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'Participant') then delete from os_cpr_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'CommonParticipant') then delete from os_participant_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'ParticipantExtension') then delete from os_participant_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenCollectionGroup') then delete from os_visit_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'VisitExtension') then delete from os_visit_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'Specimen' || entityType = 'SpecimenEvent') then delete from os_spmn_extn_recs where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'SpecimenExtension') then delete from os_spmn_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); elseif (new.entity_type = 'OrderExtension') then delete from os_order_cust_fields where form_id = new.container_id and record_id in (select record_id from catissue_form_record_entry where form_ctxt_id = new.identifier); end if; end if; end; //
